about_the_game:
A Desperate Race Against Time:
Players have only 60 minutes to collect extremophile organisms using an ultrasonic scanner and a trusty helper dog, all while Earth faces its impending demise.

Immersive Soundscape and Enchanting Music:
Hope For Us features an immersive soundscape that transports players to a world on the brink of extinction. The meticulously crafted audio environment, coupled with the enchanting musical compositions, adds an extra layer of depth to the gameplay experience. As a musician, the developer's attention to detail in the game's auditory elements truly shines, enhancing the emotional resonance of the journey and making every moment in this dying world feel even more poignant.

Environmental Platforming:
Glide through stunning landscapes, slide through narrow gaps, jump, and even punch secret walls to uncover hidden secrets.
Color-Coded Puzzles: Utilize a nanogas gun with three differently colored capsules to solve intricate puzzles, activate machines, and overcome obstacles. The order in which you shoot these capsules can be critical.

Heartfelt Narrative:
Without giving away too much, your character's journey is intertwined with the poignant story of a son left behind on a rocket destined for a new world.

Emotional Choices:
Throughout the adventure, you'll have to make heart-wrenching decisions
